Autotrack No Data 25.3 dB/0K 117.9 dBW RHCP LHCP None Transportable 17-17 17.4.2 AN/MSC-40 Terminals For the Stage la operation, the AN/MSC-46 terminals will have received suffi­ cient crystals to achieve Phase II frequency compatibility. This group of earth ter­ minals is provided with transmit carrier power monitoring equipment to control its own transmit signal power.
